titles: Three letters from the Lord General Monck, Commander in Chief of the forces in Scotland and one of the commissioners by act of Parliament for the government of the army of this commonwealth viz. to Mr. Speaker, to the Lord Fleetwood, to the Lord Lambert.
author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Contains letters to the Speaker of Parliament, to Lord Fleetwood, and to Lord Lambert, all dated October 20, 1659.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Army --  History --  17th century.
